StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateEduca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID as uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT ce.rowguid AS ID ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,ce.[SCHOOL_CODE] ,[EDUCATION_LEVEL] ,[SCHOOL_END_DATE] ,[YEAR_GRADUATED] ,[EDUCATION_TIER] ,[EDUCATION_CODE] ,[CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] ,[PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE] ,[FIRST_SENIOR] ,[VERIFICATION] ,[CUMULATIVE_GPA] ,[HIGH_MATH_LEVEL] ,[CURRENT_GPA] ,[CREDIT_HOURS] ,[FULL_TIME_STUDENT] ,[PROJECTED_TIER] ,[IsLawSchool] ,[Educa.onType] ,[Educa.onCertSubCatID] ,ce.[USER_LOGIN] ,ce.[UPDATE_DATE] ,s.[SCHOOL_TYPE] AS [SchoolType] ,COALESCE(ce.SCHOOL_END_DATE, ce.PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, ce.UPDATE_DATE) AS [SortDate] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ce WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN HIGH_SCHOOL s ON s.SCHOOL_CODE = ce.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE ce.rowguid = @ID
